home.facts: Did you know? Over 70% of users judge a website's credibility based on its design and performance.
home.facts2: JavaScript is the most commonly used programming language, with over 97% of websites using it.
home.facts3: Fun fact: A well-designed user interface can increase user retention by up to 200%.
home.facts4: The average user spends 2.6 seconds scanning a website's content before focusing on a particular section.
